channel.title: 12bay on Tuan Truong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 12bay on Tuan Truong's Blog

item.title: 12Bay integrated SwiftUI. With 12Bay, no StoryBoard, no XIB files, no cocoapods, ...
item.description: Bus booking function write by SwiftUI For three months, I dedicated myself to learning SwiftUI and using it to develop a bus booking feature. Along the way, I faced several challenges in integrating SwiftUI into an existing UIKit-based project. In my upcoming articles, I will dive deep into these challenges, providing detailed insights and solutions. But first, let’s explore the user interface for booking a ride, which includes selecting a bus route, choosing seats, and specifying pickup/drop-off points.

item.title: How to design the food selection in a mobile application
item.description: Long time no see! Just keep doing it and you’ll reach your goals. Abstract So, today we will be discussing about how to design the food selection in a mobile application. In this post, we will explore Improve your mindset about developing applications. Working on Swift, Sketch. Let’s do it. What is the purpose of the function? The main purpose is to provide more utility to customers using the 12bay application.
